segments.text: Looking at this kitchen scene, everything seems so ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman in the apron is polishing that plate meticulously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh man, the water from the sink is flooding everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear it splashing or see the puddle growing?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's going to ruin the cabinets if it keeps up like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids, climbing up there like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool is tilting back dangerously; he's going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe they're risking it just for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just egging him on, hand outstretched like she deserves one too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a mess waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but inside it's a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like yelling to get their attention.
segments.speaker: PAR
